translation.es: SUBTÍTULOS EN INGLÉS Y MANDARÍN EN BLANCO

translation.en: My father died when I was a year old.
translation.es: Mi padre murió cuando yo tenía un año.

translation.en: My mother did her best to take care of me on her own,
translation.es: Mi mamá hizo lo mejor que pudo para cuidarme ella sola,

translation.en: but after she lost her job, she couldn't afford to provide for me anymore.
translation.es: pero cuando perdió su empleo, ya no pudo mantenerme más.

translation.en: She left me with my grandparents, who lived in the rice fields,
translation.es: Me dejó con mis abuelos, que vivían en los campos de arroz,

translation.en: while she looked for work so we could be together again.
translation.es: mientras buscaba trabajo para volver a estar juntos.

translation.en: I saw things because I wanted to see them.
translation.es: que veía cosas porque quería verlas.

translation.en: I'm going to take a look.
Sorry I was a little late.
I didn't even know you were in Taiwan until Bobby asked me to pick you up.
translation.es: Supe que estabas en Taiwán cuando Bobby me pidió que te buscara.

translation.en: For a few moments, I forgot my loneliness.
translation.es: Por unos momentos, olvidé mi soledad.

translation.en: Yuan and I spent much of the next year together.
translation.es: Yuan y yo pasamos juntos gran parte del año siguiente.

translation.en: It was one of the happiest times of my life.
translation.es: Fue uno de los momentos más felices de mi vida.

translation.en: After my mother found a job and I moved back to my hometown,
translation.es: Cuando mi mamá encontró empleo y me mudé a mi ciudad natal,

translation.en: I thought I'd never see her again.
translation.es: pensé que no volvería a verla.

translation.en: But then, many years later, fate intervened.
translation.es: Pero luego, muchos años después, el destino intervino.

translation.en: I'm going outside to get some fresh air.
Maybe when I come back. Maybe.
translation.es: Tal vez cuando regrese. Tal vez.

translation.en: What the hell is she doing with you?
We met when we were kids, when I was living with my grandparents.
translation.es: Nos conocimos de niños, cuando vivía con mis abuelos.

translation.en: She moved here recently, and it just sort of happened.
translation.es: Se mudó aquí hace poco, y simplemente pasó.

translation.en: Some guys get all the luck.
You have a girl like that, you ask her to marry you.
translation.es: Si tienes una chica así, le pides que se case contigo.

translation.en: Her parents would never allow it. They're well off.
translation.es: Sus padres no lo permitirían. Son muy ricos.

translation.en: I'm a poor kid from a nothing village.
translation.es: Yo soy un pobre de aldea.

translation.en: Better have fun with her while you can, then.
I think you'll like this one.
She won't have to work anymore.
translation.es: Ella ya no tendrá que trabajar.

translation.en: Who else am I going to dance with there?
You would only get in the way of me and Faye.
translation.es: Te interpondrías entre Faye y yo.

translation.en: I'm hungry. Should we get something to eat?

translation.es: De ninguna manera. Es muy caro.

translation.en: I can't let you do that.
translation.es: No puedo dejar que lo hagas.

translation.en: I want to take you somewhere special.
translation.es: Quiero llevarte a un sitio especial.

translation.en: You're the most stubborn person I've ever met.
translation.es: Eres la persona más testaruda que conozco.

translation.en: Hello. Have you dined with us before?
Really? Then you've seen the menu.

translation.es: Los precios están a la derecha.

translation.en: Of course. We come here all the time.
I'm surprised you don't recognize us.
translation.es: Me sorprende que no nos reconozca.

translation.en: Fine, then. What would you like to order?
We'll start with the fried fish...
and a bowl of beef noodle soup.
translation.es: y la sopa de fideos y carne.

translation.en: He doesn't think we can pay? Who is he to judge us?
translation.es: ¿Cree que no podemos pagar? ¿Quién es para juzgarnos?

translation.en: Hey. They've been rude to us all night.
translation.es: Oye. Fueron groseros con nosotros toda la noche.

translation.en: Let's play a trick on them.
No. What are you talking about?
On the count of three, let's run out the door.
translation.es: A la cuenta de tres, salgamos corriendo.

translation.en: I want to spend the whole night with you, but I have to go home.
translation.es: Quiero pasar contigo toda la noche, pero debo ir a casa.

translation.en: Why don't you ever let me see your place?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nunca me dejas ver tu casa?

translation.en: If I let you see it, you'll want me for my money,
translation.es: Si te dejo verla, me querrás por mi dinero,

translation.en: instead of my good looks and charm.
translation.es: y no por ser guapo y encantador.

translation.en: Just out with some friends. Go to sleep, Ma.
translation.es: Salí con unos amigos. Ya duérmete, ma.

translation.en: So do you. You should rest up,
or else Old Li is going to pick on you again tomorrow.
translation.es: si no, Old Li volverá a meterse contigo mañana.

translation.en: Well, we can both agree that we don't like Old Li.
translation.es: Estamos de acuerdo en que no nos gusta Old Li.

translation.en: You didn't do your dishes before you left.
translation.es: No lavaste los platos antes de irte.

translation.en: I can help you with them.
I know this is a hard time for you,
translation.es: Sé que es un momento difícil para ti,

translation.en: but I really wish you had told me about the funeral.
translation.es: pero me hubiera gustado que me avisaras del funeral.

translation.en: You didn't really know her. You never visited.
translation.es: No la conocías. Nunca la visitaste.

translation.en: The last time you were in Taiwan
translation.es: La última vez que fuiste a Taiwán

translation.en: was when I took you and your brother when you were kids.
translation.es: fue cuando los llevé de niños a ti y a tu hermano.

translation.en: It's a long trip. Very far away.
translation.es: Es un viaje largo. Muy lejos.

translation.en: And I know you're busy at work.
translation.es: Y sé que estás ocupada con tu trabajo.

translation.en: You never talked much about her.
Are you sure you don't want help with the dishes?
translation.es: ¿Seguro no quieres que te ayude con los platos?

translation.en: - No. - It would only take me a second.
Say hello to Eric for me.
My mother and I worked in the factory every day.
translation.es: Mi madre y yo trabajábamos en la fábrica todos los días.

translation.en: Sometimes, I wasn't sure if I would make it through the day.
translation.es: Algunos días, no estaba seguro de si sobreviviría.

translation.en: - Hey, I think those are my gloves. -
translation.es: Creo que esos son mis guantes.

translation.en: I've got something to talk to you about. Walk with me.
translation.es: Tengo que hablarte de algo. Ven conmigo.

translation.en: I've heard you're interested in going to America. Is that true?
translation.es: Supe que te interesaba ir a Estados Unidos. ¿Es cierto?

translation.en: It's okay. You can tell me.
- Yes. It's a dream of mine. - Mmm- hmm.
It's a good goal. Many opportunities there.
translation.es: Es un buen objetivo. Hay muchas oportunidades allí.

translation.en: Very expensive to go, though. How will you get there?
translation.es: Aunque es muy caro. ¿Cómo harás para ir?

translation.en: We've been looking for someone dependable for her.
translation.es: Buscamos a alguien confiable para ella.

translation.en: Would you be interested in meeting her?
So, do you like going to school?
What do you want to do after you graduate?
Maybe become a nurse or a teacher.
translation.es: Tal vez ser enfermera o maestra.

translation.en: Nowhere. I lost track of time.
translation.es: En ningún lado. Perdí noción del tiempo.

translation.en: And then I had to stop and pick up this.
You didn't steal that, did you?
I've heard you go to restaurants and leave without paying.
translation.es: Supe que vas a restaurantes y te vas sin pagar.

translation.en: I only do that when I'm with my girlfriend.
translation.es: Solo lo hago cuando estoy con mi novia.

translation.en: You know who I heard on the radio today?
translation.es: ¿Sabes a quién escuché en la radio hoy?

translation.en: It's been stuck in my head all day.
translation.es: Lo tuve en la cabeza todo el día.

translation.en: It's not like you to be late.
Do you want to see where I live?

translation.es: Te dije que era muy elegante.

translation.en: Is this about Eric's job again?
translation.es: ¿Lo dices por el empleo de Eric?

translation.en: I would just feel more comfortable if you were with someone who could support you.
translation.es: Me sentiría mejor si estuvieras con alguien que pudiera mantenerte.

translation.en: Money's not the only important thing in a relationship.
translation.es: El dinero no es lo único importante en una relación.

translation.en: You don't really know what's important yet.
translation.es: Aún no sabes lo que es importante.

translation.en: I don't know why you think you're the one to give advice.
translation.es: No sé por qué crees que puedes dar consejos.

translation.en: It's not like your marriage turned out perfect.
He should work harder. He's not like you.
translation.es: Debería trabajar más. No es como tú.

translation.en: I could use some balance in my life.
translation.es: Me vendría bien tener equilibrio en mi vida.

translation.en: We've been together for eight months.
You don't know him well enough.
I know he's a good person.
translation.es: Sé que es una buena persona.

translation.en: We're getting married. I don't know what else there is to say.
translation.es: Vamos a casarnos. No hay nada más para decir.

translation.en: - Don't go so fast. Take your time. -
translation.es: - No tan rápido. Tómate tu tiempo. -

translation.en: You've got to fix these machines! They don't stop!
Those machines are old and broken. You shouldn't have to work there anymore.
translation.es: Las máquinas son viejas y están rotas. Ya no deberías trabajar ahí.

translation.en: No, you don't. It's miserable there.
translation.es: No, no te gusta. Es horrible ese lugar.

translation.en: What if I made enough money so you could retire and live somewhere else?
translation.es: ¿Y si yo ganara suficiente dinero para que te retires y vivas en otro lado?

translation.en: - You can get in. - All right.
I'll send for you when I get settled.
translation.es: Te vendré a buscar cuando esté instalado.

translation.en: I know it's been a long time since we've spoken.
translation.es: Sé que hace mucho tiempo que no hablamos.

translation.en: She told me your mother passed away.
translation.es: Me contó que tu madre murió.

translation.en: I know you cared about her very much.
Angela said you didn't tell her about the service.
translation.es: Angela me dijo que no le avisaste del funeral.
Está muy ocupada con su trabajo.

translation.en: I didn't want to bother her.
She works too much. She's never at home.
translation.es: Trabaja demasiado. Nunca está en casa.

translation.en: I think she's having a hard time.
translation.es: Creo que no la está pasando bien.

translation.en: Maybe it would help if you talked to her more.
translation.es: Tal vez le haría bien que le hablaras más seguido.

translation.en: I'm not hard on her. I only want what's best for her.
translation.es: No soy duro. Solo quiero lo mejor para ella.

translation.en: That may be your intention, but it's not the way it seems to her.
translation.es: Tal vez sea tu intención, pero ella no lo ve así.

translation.en: When we arrived in America, it wasn't exactly as I had pictured it.
translation.es: Cuando llegamos a Estados Unidos, no era como me lo había imaginado.

translation.en: But I had made my choice.
There was no turning back now.
Should we go out to eat to celebrate?
We don't have to eat here.
Uh... Do you dance at all?
I don't know anyone in the city.
translation.es: No conozco a nadie en la ciudad.

translation.en: Not very many Taiwanese people here.

translation.es: La mayoría son negros o puertorriqueños.

translation.en: I thought maybe you were Korean.

translation.es: No. Soy del centro de Taiwán.

translation.en: - Oh. - Thank God you're not Korean.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios que no eres coreana.

translation.en: They're very loud and they cook kimchi all day long.
translation.es: Soy muy ruidosos y cocinan kimchi todo el día.

translation.en: I haven't talked to anyone besides my husband in a long time.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no hablo con nadie más que con mi esposo.

translation.en: Do you like him at least?
He's okay. He has to work a lot.
translation.es: Está bien. Tiene que trabajar mucho.

translation.en: I get so bored in the apartment.
translation.es: Me aburro mucho en el apartamento.

translation.en: Nothing to do but clean and sit on the couch by myself.
translation.es: No hago nada más que limpiar y sentarme sola en el sofá.

translation.en: I actually come to the laundromat with small loads just to see other people.
translation.es: De hecho, vengo a la lavandería con pocas cosas solo para ver gente.
Ven a tomar el té conmigo.

translation.en: Always good to have someone to speak Mandarin with.
translation.es: Es bueno poder hablar mandarín con alguien.

translation.en: She's okay. She sprained her ankle last week.
translation.es: Está bien. La semana pasada se dobló el tobillo.

translation.en: Again? Didn't she do that a month ago?
translation.es: ¿Otra vez? ¿No le pasó lo mismo hace un mes?

translation.en: The doctor gave her a funny boot to walk around in this time.
translation.es: Esta vez, el médico le dio una bota graciosa para caminar.

translation.en: - Should I make us something to eat? - Wait...
First, I want to show you something.
I know I haven't been home very much,
translation.es: Sé que no he estado mucho en casa,

translation.en: and you haven't had the easiest time adjusting to America.
translation.es: y no se te ha sido muy fácil adaptarte a Estados Unidos.

translation.en: I thought maybe we could learn how to play together.
translation.es: Pensé que tal vez podríamos aprender a tocar juntos.

translation.en: What should I make us tonight?
- I'll go make it now. - Mmm.
You know how to play already!
- I learned it just while you were out... -
It's even worse since he took over the store.
translation.es: Es peor desde que se hizo cargo de la tienda.

translation.en: He never wants to go out or do anything.
translation.es: Nunca quiere salir ni hacer nada.

translation.en: You've been married for a while.
translation.es: Ya hace un tiempo que están casados.

translation.en: Of course he doesn't make an effort anymore.
translation.es: Claro que ya no se esfuerza.

translation.en: You're not winning any beauty pageants.
translation.es: Tú tampoco eres una reina de belleza.

translation.en: We don't have anything in common.
Eventually, your life together is what you'll have in common.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, su vida juntos será lo que tendrán en común.
Tal vez. Aún no ha sucedido.

translation.en: What'd you put in this meatball? It tastes like shit.
translation.es: ¿Qué le pusiste a las albóndigas? Saben a mierda.

translation.en: Then cook it yourself. Quit your whining.
translation.es: Entonces, cocínalo tú. Deja de quejarte.
El apartamento está listo. Está todo listo.

translation.en: It's not big, but it's bigger than your house.
translation.es: No es grande, pero es más grande que tu casa.

translation.en: You wouldn't have to do anything. You could retire, like we talked about.
translation.es: No tendrías que hacer nada. Podrías retirarte, como hablamos.

translation.en: I didn't either, but you can meet people once you're here.
translation.es: Yo tampoco conocía a nadie, pero puedes conocer gente aquí.

translation.en: We talked about this before I left.
translation.es: Ya hablamos de esto antes de irme.

translation.en: I thought this is what you wanted.
translation.es: Pensaba que era lo que querías.

translation.en: I went to Peijing's for dinner.
translation.es: Fui a cenar a lo de Peijing.

translation.en: I thought you'd be at work. I lost track of time.
translation.es: Pensé que estarías trabajando. Perdí la noción del tiempo.

translation.en: There was no food in the house.
Peijing thinks if I go to school for just a few years,
translation.es: Peijing cree que si estudio algunos años,

translation.en: I can get a teaching credential.
Then maybe I could become a teacher.
After we have kids, you won't have time to work anyway.
translation.es: Cuando tengamos hijos, no tendrás tiempo de trabajar.

translation.en: Well, we don't have them yet.
Just take the classes and see what happens.
translation.es: Solo toma las clases a ver qué pasa.

translation.en: I'll look into when they start.
Again? Aren't you worried you'll get fat?
I'm already married. Who gives a shit?
translation.es: Ya estoy casada. ¿A quién le importa?

translation.en: Do you want to pack these?
No. You can throw them out.
You asked me to have lunch with you.
But then, after we sat down, you just...
sat there for an hour and barely said anything.
translation.es: ...estuviste ahí una hora y casi no dijiste nada.

translation.en: Didn't seem like you wanted to talk.
translation.es: Me pareció que no querías hablar.

translation.en: Actually, that's not true. I'm not fine.
translation.es: De hecho, no. No estoy bien.

translation.en: I don't think he's coming back.
translation.es: Creo que no va a regresar.

translation.en: I think it was my fault.
translation.es: ...que creo que fue por mi culpa.

translation.en: What else is there to say?
Didn't you go through the same thing with Mom?
translation.es: ¿No te pasó lo mismo con mamá?

translation.en: I wouldn't know because you never told me what happened.
translation.es: No lo sé, porque nunca me contaste qué pasó.

translation.en: Why can't you just say something nice?
translation.es: ¿Por qué simplemente no dices algo lindo?

translation.en: You could try to make me feel better.
You could tell me that everything's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Podrías decirme que todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: All I ever wanted, my whole life...
translation.es: Lo único que quise, toda mi vida...

translation.en: was to feel like I had someone who cared about me, no matter what happened.
translation.es: ...era sentir que tenía a alguien que me quería, sin importar nada más.

translation.en: I never got that from you.
I don't even know how to talk to you. I never have.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé cómo hablarte. Nunca lo supe.

translation.en: Maybe it's easier if we just stop trying.
translation.es: Tal vez sea más fácil dejar de intentarlo.

translation.en: What happened to the hedges out front?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con los setos de afuera?

translation.en: I told the gardeners they could trim them.
translation.es: Les dije a los jardineros que los podaran.

translation.en: You weren't here. I didn't know what you wanted.
translation.es: Tú no estabas aquí. No sabía lo que querías.

translation.en: They look terrible. How could you not know?
translation.es: Se ven horribles. ¿Cómo no te diste cuenta?

translation.en: Hey. They'll take forever to grow back now.
I don't want to be with you anymore.
Don't tell me what I want.
translation.es: No me digas lo que quiero.

translation.en: You're acting crazy. Go to sleep.
- This is my house. You do what I say. - I don't care about your stupid house.
translation.es: - Es mi casa. Se hace lo que yo digo. - No me importa tu estúpida casa.

translation.en: I've made up my mind. I'm leaving.
You treat me like a servant.
translation.es: Me tratas como a una sirvienta.

translation.en: I give you everything. Nice clothes, a nice car.
translation.es: Te doy todo. Ropa bonita, un auto bonito.

translation.en: I don't care about that stuff.
That's not how we do things.
Don't forget, I was the one who brought you here.
translation.es: No lo olvides, yo te traje aquí.

translation.en: Yes, I came here with nothing.
translation.es: Sí, cuando vine no tenía nada.

translation.en: And I built all of this myself, while you stayed at home.
translation.es: Y logré todo esto solo, mientras tú estabas en casa.

translation.en: I raised our children while you were never home.
translation.es: Crie a nuestros hijos mientras tú no estabas.

translation.en: Where were you all those nights? Where?
Good! Get out. I never wanted to marry you.
I used to think you could learn to care about anyone other than yourself.
translation.es: Pensaba que podrías querer a alguien más que a ti mismo.

translation.en: If I could travel back in time,
translation.es: Si pudiera volver en el tiempo,

translation.en: I would go back to the moment I met you
translation.es: volvería al momento cuando te conocí

translation.en: So far that I would never see you again.
translation.es: Tan lejos como para no volver a verte.

translation.en: I think you shrank, old man!
- How was your trip in? - Not bad.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal el viaje? - No estuvo mal.

translation.en: New York is amazing. Much more exciting than Maryland!
translation.es: Nueva York es increíble. ¡Mucho más emocionante que Maryland!

translation.en: Is the weather always this nice in the spring?
translation.es: ¿El clima siempre es tan lindo en primavera?

translation.en: Maybe I should spend more time here.
translation.es: Tal vez debería pasar más tiempo aquí.

translation.en: Hey, they have spicy beef noodle soup here.
translation.es: Aquí tienen sopa picante de fideos y carne.

translation.en: - Should we get some? - Of course!
You have such good Chinese food here.
translation.es: Hay comida china muy buena aquí.

translation.en: Yes. Another perk of living here.
translation.es: Sí. Otra ventaja de vivir aquí.

translation.en: Should we run away without paying like we did at Yuelu?
translation.es: ¿Nos vamos sin pagar como hicimos en Yuelu?

translation.en: It would be fun... but I have money to pay now.
translation.es: Sería divertido... pero ahora tengo dinero para pagar.

translation.en: You used to be so crazy.
I was just doing crazy stuff to impress you.
translation.es: Yo solo hacía locuras para impresionarte.

translation.en: We were bad for each other.
translation.es: No éramos buenos el uno para el otro.

translation.en: The day I left, I was in the back of a car leaving town.
translation.es: El día que me fui, estaba en el asiento trasero de un auto.

translation.en: I thought I saw you out the window. Was that you?
translation.es: Me pareció verte por la ventana. ¿Eras tú?

translation.en: But when I looked back, you were gone.
translation.es: Pero cuando volví a mirar, ya no estabas.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was dreaming or not.
But I couldn't bear to watch you go, so I left.
translation.es: Pero no soporté verte partir, así que me fui.

translation.en: It's so long ago, I feel like I can finally ask.
translation.es: Pasó tanto tiempo, que finalmente creo que puedo preguntar.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me you were leaving?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijiste que te ibas?

translation.en: I had to find out where you went from neighborhood gossip.
translation.es: Me enteré de adónde te habías ido por los comentarios del pueblo.

translation.en: What good would it have done?
You seem to have a good life now.
translation.es: Parece que ahora tienes una buena vida.
Mi esposo se acaba de retirar.

translation.en: We have a lot of time on our own now.
translation.es: Ahora tenemos mucho tiempo para nosotros.

translation.en: Good. Bobby has a band that's done very well.
translation.es: Bien. Bobby tiene una banda a la que le ha ido bien.

translation.en: He just got back from a tour in Europe.
translation.es: Acaba de volver de una gira por Europa.

translation.en: She has trouble getting along with people.
translation.es: Le cuesta relacionarse con la gente.

translation.en: I don't know how to talk to her.
translation.es: No sé cómo hablar con ella.

translation.en: You should know something about that.
Maybe before she opens up, she needs you to open up to her first.
translation.es: Tal vez necesita que hables tú primero.

translation.en: This was fun. Thank you for lunch.
translation.es: Fue divertido. Gracias por el almuerzo.

translation.en: You're welcome. It was good to see you.
I just wanted to say a little something.
As you know, this hasn't been the easiest year for me,
translation.es: Ya saben que este no fue el año más fácil para mí,

translation.en: but it really means a lot to see all your faces again,
translation.es: pero significa mucho volver a verlos

translation.en: and be able to celebrate together. Thank you so much for coming.
translation.es: y poder festejar juntos. Muchas gracias por venir.

translation.en: Do you want anything else to drink? Wine?
- Here you go. Of course. - Thank you.
I'm so glad you guys could make it out here for the party.
translation.es: Me alegra mucho que pudieran venir a la fiesta.

translation.en: It's hard for me to miss work. My students miss me!
translation.es: Me cuesta faltar a mi trabajo. ¡Mis alumnos me extrañan!

translation.en: They love her. They think she's very funny.
translation.es: La adoran. Les parece muy divertida.

translation.en: I'm sure they do. Are you guys traveling anywhere this year?
translation.es: Estoy segura. ¿Se irán a algún lado este año?

translation.en: For spring break, we're gonna go to Costa Rica
translation.es: En el receso de primavera iremos a Costa Rica

translation.en: and then, in the summer, we go back to Croatia.
translation.es: y luego, en verano, volveremos a Croacia.

translation.en: You don't have to help. I got it.
Why don't you go to the dining room? I'll make us some tea.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vas a la sala? Nos haré un té.

translation.en: This is the first time I've hosted this party by myself,
translation.es: Es la primera vez que hago esta fiesta sola,

translation.en: Sometimes, I wonder if I'll ever find anyone like him again.
translation.es: A veces me pregunto si alguna vez encontraré a alguien como él.

translation.en: Do you know what I mean?
I knew her before your mother.
translation.es: La conocí antes que a tu madre.

translation.en: There are many things I never told you.
translation.es: Hay muchas cosas que nunca te conté.

translation.en: What did you do after Mom left?
My father died when I was a year old.
translation.es: Mi padre murió cuando yo tenía un año.

translation.en: My mother left me with my grandparents, who lived in the rice fields.
translation.es: Mi mamá me dejó con mis abuelos, que vivían en los campos de arroz,

translation.en: I worked here with my mother for several years.
translation.es: Trabajé con mi mamá aquí por varios años.

translation.en: It was hard work, but I was grateful that we were together.
translation.es: Era trabajo duro, pero yo agradecía que estuviéramos juntos.

translation.en: Your grandmother was a very strong woman.
translation.es: Tu abuela era una mujer muy fuerte.

translation.en: We walked home together on this path every day.
translation.es: Caminábamos juntos por este camino todos los días.

translation.en: It didn't look like this the last time I was here.
translation.es: No se veía así la última vez que estuve aquí.

translation.en: There was a bar down there.
The girl and I used to go there to dance.
translation.es: La chica y yo solíamos ir ahí a bailar.
